LookupReference A class which allows us to keep HLA information about objects which have been garbage collected by the local JVM.
ObjectLookup This gives an interface on to the local and remote object databases.
ProxyList ProxyLists are lists of reflected proxy objects.
PublicObject PublicObject is the primary class which should be subclassed to represent globally shared objects in an HLA_RePast simulation.
PublicVariable This is the root class for all share-able variables in an HLA_RePast model.
ReferenceTable A ReferenceTable is a mechanism for accessing and tracking strong references to PublicObjects in the local Java Virtual Machine.
